import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import { uniqueId } from 'lodash'; import GlobalStyle from '../../../styles/global'; import { App, Container, Content } from './styles.js'; import Axios from 'axios'; import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' function addImgEmotion() { const history = useHistory(); const [name,setName] = useState(""); const [type,setType] = useState(""); const [emotion,setEmotion] = useState(""); async function create(){ if(!name || !type || !emotion){ window.alert('Prencha todos os campos') } await Axios.post( '/createdActivity', {name, type, emotion}, window.alert('Cadastrado') ) .then(response => console.log(JSON.stringify({ "nome": name, "tipo": type, "emoção trabalhada": emotion })), console.log("Enviado!") ); } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); await create(); history.push('/Activities') } return (
Adicionando Atividade

{setName(e.target.value)}}/>
{setEmotion(e.target.id)}}>
{setEmotion(e.target.id)}}>
{setEmotion(e.target.id)}}>
{setEmotion(e.target.id)}}>
); } export default addImgEmotion;
